alert.note: Alert for Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mesa County through 615 PM MDT... At 530 PM MDT, meteorologists and satellite imagery were tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles east of Castle Valley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Satellite imagery indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Mesa County, including the following locations... Gateway. This includes Colorado 141 between mile markers 110 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
